vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.14.1
§ Chedorlaomer = "handful of sheaves"
the king of Elam defeated by Abraham
vocabInfos._es_Definition: rey de Elam; en tiempos de Abraham
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
基大老瑪 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "一捆"
以攔王, 被亞伯拉罕擊敗
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
基大老玛 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "一捆"
以拦王, 被亚伯拉罕击败
